mapper.select: select teacher_attendance.attendance_start as attendanceStart, teacher_attendance.attendance_end as attendanceEnd, teacher_attendance.attendance_day as attendanceDay, teacher.teacher_name as teacherName from teacher_attendance left join teacher on teacher_attendance.attendance_no = teacher.teacher_no where teacher_attendance.teacher_no = #{teacherNo} and teacher_attendance.attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher_attendance SET attendance_end=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s') WHERE teacher_no=#{teacherNo} and attendance_day=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d');
mapper.select: select attendance_end from teacher_attendance where teacher_no = #{teacherNo} and attendance_day = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
